body.p: To his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned would respectfully State to Your Honour that at the Septr. Term 1858 of the Caldwell Circuit Court a Judgment was rendered against Mason McDowel for $705.00 ^(Seventy five dollars)^ for carrying concealed weapons -- He was a Youth, son of A. R. McDowel a very worthy but poor citizen of our county, who has recently had to pay the said fine for his Son Mason, having replived the same heretofore to keep him from going to Jail -- In view of the great hardship on A. R. McDowel, (his son having left the state) The undersigned would respectfully ask the interposition of Executive clemency in his behalf, & that Your Excellency would order the restoration of the same to him except officers fees &c.

B,, N, Dawson
